int five_deg[] = {206,205,204,203,202,78,77,76,75,74,200,199,198,197,196,136,135,134,133,132,72,71,70,69,68,81,110,113,142,145,174,177,181,170,149,138,117,106,85,183,168,151,123,100,91,221,222,223,226,224,253,254,255};
for (int i = 0; i < 53; i++){
leds[five_deg[i]] = CHSV( 86,255,100);
}
FastLED.show();
